Text.val: 04.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
19.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select distinct a.AUTH_TYPE, HUSR_ID, HUSR_NAME, HUSR_DEPARTMENTROLE from :1/husr, :1/auth a where husr_id <> ':2' and husr_currentemployee = 'Y' and ((husr_departmentrole, a.AUTH_TYPE) in (select auth_departmentrole1, AUTH_TYPE from :1/auth where auth_departmentrole2 in (select AUTHa.AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE2 from :1/AUTH AUTHa, :1/HUSR HUSRa where HUSRa.HUSR_ID = ':2' and (AUTHa.AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE2 = HUSRa.HUSR_DEPARTMENTROLE))) or (husr_departmentrole, a.AUTH_TYPE) in (select auth_departmentrole2, AUTH_TYPE from :1/auth where auth_departmentrole1 in (select AUTHa.AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE1 from :1/AUTH AUTHa, :1/HUSR HUSRa where HUSRa.HUSR_ID = ':2' and (AUTHa.AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE1 = HUSRa.HUSR_DEPARTMENTROLE)))) :3 order by a.AUTH_TYPE, HUSR_ID

select a.AUTH_TYPE from :1/husr, :1/auth a where husr_id <> ':2' and husr_currentemployee = 'Y' and ((husr_departmentrole, a.AUTH_TYPE) in (select auth_departmentrole1, AUTH_TYPE from :1/auth where auth_departmentrole2 in (select AUTHa.AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE2 from :1/AUTH AUTHa, :1/HUSR HUSRa where HUSRa.HUSR_ID = ':2' and (AUTHa.AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE2 = HUSRa.HUSR_DEPARTMENTROLE))) or (husr_departmentrole, a.AUTH_TYPE) in (select auth_departmentrole2, AUTH_TYPE from :1/auth where auth_departmentrole1 in (select AUTHa.AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE1 from :1/AUTH AUTHa, :1/HUSR HUSRa where HUSRa.HUSR_ID = ':2' and (AUTHa.AUTH_DEPARTMENTROLE1 = HUSRa.HUSR_DEPARTMENTROLE)))) group by a.AUTH_TYPE
